ygData.subject: Vote of praise for moderation and
ygData.msgSnippet: I am glad that this list is now monitored.  Now that it is, can we please ban this person that wrote the childish and totally unacceptable message below. I
ygData.messageBody:
I am glad that this list is now monitored. Now that it is, can we please ban
this person that wrote the childish and totally unacceptable message below.
I suggest that we hold a silent vote or something to that effect. I will refrain
from flaming him in the list, though I am sure he will make it known to me that
he is not happy with my suggestion =)


{{**SNIP - Copy of the original offensive post remove by moderator... we all saw it... and don't need to see it again... but no harm done including it either, I just don't want it on this list again :) - Adam**}}
